name: microlib-tabs
description: Create HTML tabs without the need of dependencies or complex functions. Tabs is a small library providing a way of creating tabs without needing to create more HTML than you need to.

scripts.build-all: npm run build-prod && npm run build-standalone-prod
scripts.build-prod: npm run build && uglifyjs dist/tabs.microlib-latest.js --compress --mangle --screw-ie8 --output dist/tabs.microlib-2.1.0.min.js
